meaningMnemonic: <kanji>Sink</kanji> and <kanji>stagnate</kanji>. Imagine something is doing just that. It is in the state of <vocabulary>stagnation</vocabulary> and <vocabulary>inactivity</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
